## Checklist
<!-- Mark completed items with an "x" -->

### General
- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes

### Database Changes (if applicable)
- [ ] I have created/updated database migration files
- [ ] Schema validation passes locally (`npm run schema:validate`)
- [ ] Database types are updated (`npm run schema:types`)
- [ ] Integration tests pass locally (`npm run test:integration`)

### Testing
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] Unit tests pass (`npm run test:unit`)
- [ ] Build succeeds (`npm run build`)
